name: Secure View™ Smart Garage Opener with Built-in Camera, LED Corner to Corner Lighting™ System, Battery Backup, Ultra-Quiet Belt Drive®
description: The LiftMaster 87504-267 is a top-tier smart garage door opener featuring a built-in camera with 2-way audio, 360° corner-to-corner LED lighting, battery backup for power outages, and an ultra-quiet belt drive system. It integrates with myQ for remote control, monitoring, and secure access.
shortDescription: Ultra-quiet belt drive smart opener with camera, corner-to-corner LED lighting, battery backup, and myQ connectivity.
features: Quiet and smooth operation with best-in-class belt drive system and DC motor for reliable service
myQ® Connected: Control, secure, and monitor the garage from the myQ app anytime, from anywhere
Secure in-garage delivery: Enables Amazon Key In-Garage Delivery (free for Prime members)
Battery backup: Ensures garage access even when power is out
Security+ 2.0®: Sends a new code with every remote click for enhanced security
Invisible light beam safety system with auto-reverse
PosiLock® electronic protection against forced openings
Motion detection: Automatically lights the way for added safety
Built-in 130° wide-angle camera with 2-way communication via myQ app
Integrated LED Corner to Corner Lighting: 2,000 lumens in a 360° ring for uniform garage illumination

specifications.motor: 12V DC, 53 RPM, automatic thermal protection, permanent lubrication
specifications.mechanics: Steel chassis, T-rail and trolley, full reinforced belt drive (63:1 gear reduction), auto-force adjustment, electronic limits, DC Wi-Fi logic board with built-in surge suppressor
specifications.power: 120V AC, 60 Hz, 2.7A current rating, UL Listed, 4' power cord (3-prong)
specifications.speed: 9 inches per second upward, 6.5 inches per second downward

dimensions.head: 10.5" L x 18.7" W x 8.185" H (30" wide with doors open)

inTheBox: The Protector System® Safety Reversing Sensors
